edu.cs495.engine.gfx.obj

Class Light

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cs495.engine.gfx.obj.Light
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Renderable

    public class Light
extends java.lang.Object
implements Renderable
    A light graphics object which holds information about a light
    Version:
    February 2019
    Author:
    Spencer Imbleau

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int diameter
      The diameter of the light
      int[] lightMap
      The graphical ARGB lighting map for the light object

      The radius of the light
      int rgb
      The color of the light in RGB format (no alpha!)

      • Light

        public Light(int radius,
             int rgb,
             float lightPower)
        Initializes the light with information
        Parameters:
        radius - - the radius of the light
        rgb - - The color of the light in RGB format
        lightPower - - Power of the light (0 <= lightPower <= 1)

    • Method Detail

      • getLightValue

        public int getLightValue(int x,
                         int y)
        Get the light value at a certain point in the light map
        Parameters:
        x - - X coordinate of the light map
        y - - Y coordinate of the light map
        Returns:
        the pixel value at the (x, y) coordiante given
